Argument.Name: name
Argument.Description: The unique name of the factory node to be added

Argument.Name: instanceId
Argument.Description: The id of the factory instance (e.g. 5, if installed in xyna_005)

Argument.Name: linkchanneltype
Argument.Description: The type of the remote access implementation (RMI)

Argument.Name: linkchannelparameter
Argument.Description: Initialization parameters specific to the linkchanneltype (RMI->hostname, port, keystorefile, keystoretype, keystorepass, truststorefile, truststoretype, truststorepass)

Argument.Name: linkprofiles
Argument.Description: Link profiles to activate (Infrastructure, OrderExecution, RuntimeContextManagement, FileManagement, Monitoring)
